Class LabelController

    com.viaoa.hub.HubListener, EventListener
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    OAFunctionLabel.OAFunctionLabelController, OALabel.OALabelController

    public class LabelController
extends OAJfcController
    Controller for binding OA to JLabel.

    vvia
